front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Insulation Piercing Connectors

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The technical requirements, tests, inspection rules, sign, and package of insulation-piercing connector used in aerial insulated cable lines, bridges and culverts, galleries, tunnels, mines, cable wells, etc., for rated voltages up to 12kV are defined and described in this standard.
